recipe.title: How to Make Waffles
recipe.intro: Crispy waffles are a favourite breakfast in many Australian cafÃ©s. You can add many toppings like fruit, cream, and maple syrup!
recipe.ingredients: plain flour, baking powder, sugar, eggs, milk, butter, vanilla extract, a pinch of salt
steps: **Mix** the flour, baking powder, sugar, and salt in a large bowl.
**Whisk** the eggs, milk, melted butter, and vanilla in another bowl.
**Pour** the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and **stir** until just combined.
**Heat** the waffle iron and **brush** it lightly with butter.
**Pour** some batter into the waffle iron and **close** the lid.
**Cook** for 3 to 4 minutes until golden and crispy. **Serve** with your favourite toppings!
